mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.zuoye_id as zuoyeId ,a.xuesheng_id as xueshengId ,a.huifu_file as huifuFile ,a.huida_types as huidaTypes ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,xuesheng.xuesheng_name as xueshengName ,xuesheng.xuesheng_phone as xueshengPhone ,xuesheng.xuesheng_photo as xueshengPhoto ,zuoye.zuoye_uuid_number as zuoyeUuidNumber ,zuoye.zuoye_name as zuoyeName ,zuoye.zuoye_types as zuoyeTypes
FROM huida a left JOIN xuesheng xuesheng ON a.xuesheng_id = xuesheng.id left JOIN zuoye zuoye ON a.zuoye_id = zuoye.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.zuoye_id = #{params.zuoyeId} )
and ( a.xuesheng_id = #{params.xueshengId} )
and a.xuesheng_id IS NOT NULL
and xuesheng.xuesheng_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengName},'%')
and xuesheng.xuesheng_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengPhone},'%')
and xuesheng.xuesheng_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengIdNumber},'%')
and xuesheng.banji_types = #{params.banjiTypes}
and xuesheng.xuesheng_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengEmail},'%')
and a.zuoye_id IS NOT NULL
and zuoye.jiaoshi_id = #{params.jiaoshiId}
and zuoye.banji_types = #{params.banjiTypes}
and zuoye.zuoye_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.zuoyeUuidNumber},'%')
and zuoye.zuoye_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.zuoyeName},'%')
and zuoye.zuoye_types = #{params.zuoyeTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(zuoye.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(zuoye.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and zuoye.zuoye_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.zuoyeContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
